channel.title: Need help whit spawn npc on 667
channel.description:
Hmm i need help to spawn npc's on the 667, for the first i put
528 - 3175 3473 0 in unpackedspawnlist.txt
But it aint packing anyone know why?
"npcspawning.java" does not work

item.title: Need help whit spawn npc on 667
item.dc:creator: @xxfallenangelxx xxfallenangelxx
item.description:
@xxfallenangelxx wrote:

the compiler in the main folder compiles it. theres not another compiler in the data folder to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help whit spawn npc on 667

item.title: Need help whit spawn npc on 667
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

[quote=“alex321, post:6, topic:439810”][quote author=Potzon link=topic=542503.msg3977580#msg3977580 date=1334853743]

Use this code in Npcspawning.java:

Change “5529” to the NPC ID you want, and “2323”, “3795” and “0” to the coords where you want to put the npc.

For the first, i dont have a file called npcspawning.java
[/quote]Did you search for it in your source file? If you not have, do like this:
Go to data/npcs. Put your “packedSpawns” folder somewhere on your computer where you can find it later.
Open “unpackedSpawns” and write in a code like this, NPCID - XCOORD YCOORD ZCOORD (change the letters to numbers).
Compile the server, run it, and you’ll see a new “packedSpawns” folder in data/npcs.

is there any compiler that compiles it? because i has no compiler that compile data/npc[/quote]Hmm…Try to use this code in your server/source compiler,

@echo off title Compiler echo Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/cache/*.java src/com/rs/cache/loaders/*.java src/com/rs/cores/*.java src/com/rs/game/*.java src/com/rs/game/item/*.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/impl/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/corp/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dragons/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dungeonnering/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/bandos/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/barrows/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/saradomin/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zammorak/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zaros/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/kalph/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/others/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/slayer/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/rooms/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java src/com/rs/game/tasks/*.java src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/io/*.java src/com/rs/net/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java src/com/rs/net/encoders/*.java src/com/rs/tools/*.java src/com/rs/utils/*.java src/com/rs/utils/huffman/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/armadyl/*.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: Need help whit spawn npc on 667

item.title: Need help whit spawn npc on 667
item.dc:creator: @alex321 alex321
item.description:
@alex321 wrote:

[quote=“Potzon, post:5, topic:439810”][quote author=alex321 link=topic=542503.msg3977563#msg3977563 date=1334851216]

Use this code in Npcspawning.java:

Change “5529” to the NPC ID you want, and “2323”, “3795” and “0” to the coords where you want to put the npc.

For the first, i dont have a file called npcspawning.java
[/quote]Did you search for it in your source file? If you not have, do like this:
Go to data/npcs. Put your “packedSpawns” folder somewhere on your computer where you can find it later.
Open “unpackedSpawns” and write in a code like this, NPCID - XCOORD YCOORD ZCOORD (change the letters to numbers).
Compile the server, run it, and you’ll see a new “packedSpawns” folder in data/npcs.[/quote]
is there any compiler that compiles it? because i has no compiler that compile data/npc

Read full topic
item.source: Need help whit spawn npc on 667

item.title: Need help whit spawn npc on 667
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

[quote=“alex321, post:4, topic:439810”][quote author=Potzon link=topic=542503.msg3976811#msg3976811 date=1334752487]
Use this code in Npcspawning.java:

Change “5529” to the NPC ID you want, and “2323”, “3795” and “0” to the coords where you want to put the npc.
[/quote]
For the first, i dont have a file called npcspawning.java[/quote]Did you search for it in your source file? If you not have, do like this:
Go to data/npcs. Put your “packedSpawns” folder somewhere on your computer where you can find it later.
Open “unpackedSpawns” and write in a code like this, NPCID - XCOORD YCOORD ZCOORD (change the letters to numbers).
Compile the server, run it, and you’ll see a new “packedSpawns” folder in data/npcs.

Read full topic
